title: When You Wish Upon A STAR
description: When You Wish Upon A STAR，东方同人本。

latest_comment.content: 感觉药味老师的嘴画得很诡异……

When you wish upon a star，当你向着星星许愿时，Makes no difference who you are，无论你是谁，Anything your heart desires，所有你心里渴望的东西，Will come to you，都会向你奔来，If your heart is in your dreams，如果你心之所想都在梦里，No request is too extreme，没有太过分的要求，When you wish upon a star，当你向着星星许愿时，As dreamers do，就像梦想家一样，Fate is kind，命运是仁慈的，She brings to those who love，她会帮那些充满爱的人，the sweet fullfillment of their secret love，满足他们心中深藏的爱，Oh, like a bolt out of the blue，噢，就像晴天霹雳，Fate steps in and sees you through，命运走进你的生活，将你看透，When you wish upon a star，当你想着星星许愿时，Your dream comes true，你的梦想将会实现，
